job.title: Senior Software Test Engineer
job.description: At DISH the Testing and Quality Assurance TQA teams mission is to deliver software that meets business needs and allows for a positive customer experience The Senior Software Test Engineer as part of the software development family is a leader in the development of automated test solutions to support the overall software delivery team in a fastpaced IT environment They ensure software meets business requirements coach and drive the team to design execute and test scenarios that exercise all required test conditions to ensure all deadlines are metbrulli Perform Oracle E Business Suite functional testing lili Develop and build an Automation framework for Oracle E Business Suite lili Coordinate and manage a single application project from a test perspective including assigned resources and testing progress lili Develop and review the test plans and test coverage including scope definition resource identification risks and schedule lili Lead requirements and test designcase reviews perform test case reviews with other team members lili Represent the test team in project status meeting and communicate issues appropriately lili Review test scripts Automation and Manual for coding best practice and ease of maintainability perspective lili Compile and analyze metrics on testing activities and generate testing status reports during the testing phase lili Design create and maintain manual and automation test scripts lili Run tests during the execution test phase and report issues identified lili Create and distribute dailyweekly status reports to management lili Other duties as required lili BABS or MAMS preferred plus 48 years of progressively related experience lili Advanced knowledge of Oracle E Business Suite version 12 lili Advanced knowledge of the following modules Financials Order Management Time and Labor lili Strong knowledge of EDI document type and interfaces lili Applied knowledge of SQL or other database query tools lili Applied knowledge of designing building and maintaining automation frameworks lili Advanced knowledge of software testing techniques methodologies policies and procedures lili Advanced knowledge of test management and automation toolsets lili High level of curiosity and strong desire to succeed lili Strong verbal written communication and presentation skills all levels ie leadership customers vendors and business partners lili Able to represent the overall testing organization in a positive and intelligent manner lili Ability to solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists liul Compensation 7470000Yr  11842500YrbrbrFrom versatile health perks to new career opportunities check out our benefits on our careers website brbrEmployment is contingent on Successful completion of a preemployment screen which may include a drug test
